Herosection.heading: CT Assessment
Herosection.description: Study of cooling tower thermal design, fan curves, operating duty point, performance curves, nozzle and duct sizing and present performance to predicted performance. In house and international computer programmes to check ratings of cooling tower.

Herosection.heading: CT Site Data Verification
Herosection.description: Site visits, physical observation of critical parameters, critical components like CT fan, Nozzles, CT Fills, CT layout and other possible causes of loss of performance. Site operating conditions vs cooling tower design considerations. Data collections at site using latest equipment.

Herosection.heading: CT Performance Testing
Herosection.description: We carry out PG test for cooling towers as per CTI ATC 105 to verify the performance of New or Existing cooling towers to verify the capability of the towers. This includes data to be collected as per performance test method CTI ATC 105 and additional data like air velocity and temperatures contours above drift eliminators, fan air flow measurement, inlet air velocity contours, recirculation patterns.

Herosection.heading: CT Performance Upgrade Solutions
Herosection.description: We provide total solutions to cooling tower performance shortfall. From collecting and analysing Data to provide solutions in the form of change of components, improving existing components and providing experienced agency to carry out the work successfully.

Herosection.heading: CT Seminars And Training
Herosection.description: We can provide Seminars on Various aspects of cooling towers from Design to operation to latest trends in industry and factors affecting performance of towers, various types of Fills and their suitability. Environment considerations, operational considerations and efficiency considerations.

Herosection.heading: CT Bid Specifications And Bid Reviews
Herosection.description: We can assist in creating suitable specification for the cooling towers and also review technically the bids so as to provide the most optimum and technically correct cooling tower Bid.

Herosection.heading: Proof Testing Of Fill Media
Herosection.description: We can assist in arranging of testing of fills in highly reputed 3rd party laboratory so that the fill and its performance are tested and documented in a sophisticated and highly accurate laboratory.

Herosection.heading: Water Flow Testing
Herosection.description: We can provide services for measurement of water flow using either ultrasonic flow meter or traversing pitot tube.

AboutCompany.mainHeading: Discover the “Effective Method” to Improve Cooling Tower Performance
AboutCompany.subHeading: Every cooling tower is different and operates in response to a set of conditions based on its design capability. Identify, Isolate & Introduce components to Improve cooling tower performance with a clear understanding of boundaries of the existing cooling tower.

cards.title: Utam Galva Metallics Ltd – Wardha.
cards.description: Thermal testing was carried out to assess the present tower performance and reason for shortfall. The tower consisted of 4 cells of counter flow IDCT with film fill.

cards.title: UPL limited Ankleshwar
cards.description: A total of 16 towers were tested and compete ratings design vs present rating were presented. Report was submitted indicating the reasons for nonperformance and ways and means to improve the tower. In some towers the fills were changed as per recommendations and the tower performance and clogging which was previously observed were drastically reduced.

cards.title: JORD INDUSTRIES - UAE DUBAI
cards.description: UAE DUBAI for the cooling towers catering to EMAR-BHURJ KHALIFA. A total of 6 cells were tested and the capacity of each tower was established along with the actual design capacity of the tower. The reason for major shortfall in the towers were identified and report was handed over to EMAR through JORD INDUSTRIES. There were major problems with the water distribution, which was identified, and accordingly suitable nozzle sizing was varied to suit the existing condition. Similarly, fan performance issues have been pointed out and action would be taken shortly.
